dev-master.name: plateau/mezzanine
dev-master.description: Mezzanine is a Laravel4 package for easy asset management. His main feature is     to provide a dual source management to each asset, meaning you can use a local file for your developpment needs,   then use a faster CDN source for production, without modifying your code.

v1.0.name: plateau/mezzanine
v1.0.description:
Mezzanine is a Laravel4 package for easy asset management. His main feature is 
    to provide a dual source management to each asset, meaning you can use a local file for your developpment needs,
    then use a faster CDN source for production, without modifying your code.
